query: making a sandwich step by step guide
steps: Step 1: Gather all necessary ingredients including bread, protein (meat, cheese, or plant-based), vegetables, condiments, and any spreads or seasonings
Step 2: Prepare your work surface by cleaning a cutting board or plate and laying out all ingredients within arm's reach
Step 3: Select two slices of bread and place them side by side on the work surface
Step 4: Apply condiments and spreads evenly to the inner surface of both bread slices using a knife
Step 5: Layer protein and vegetables on one slice of bread in the order of your preference, ensuring even distribution
Step 6: Press the second slice of bread on top of the filled slice, cut diagonally if desired, and serve immediately
